str2: But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Probably a fuller form of rheo; an alternate for epo in certain tenses; to utter, i.e. Speak or say.
Adverb from the base of pou; an interrogative particle of manner; in what way?; also as exclamation, how much!
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
(a) adj: dead, lifeless, subject to death, mortal, (b) noun: a dead body, a corpse. From an apparently primary nekus; dead.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (a) I wake, arouse, (b) I raise up. Probably akin to the base of agora; to waken, i.e. Rouse.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Dative Neuter Singular
str2: Of what sort. From the base of pou and hoios; individualizing interrogative what sort of, or which one.
Body, flesh; the body of the Church. From sozo; the body, used in a very wide application, literally or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
